## gradient() function

Calculates the gradient of a line between the two points.  gradient 

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function gradient(p1: PointXY, p2: PointXY): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p1 | [PointXY](./util.pointxy) | First point in the line |
|  p2 | [PointXY](./util.pointxy) | Second point in the line  {<!-- -->number<!-- -->} The gradient of a line between the two points. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
